message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: OASIS OSLC Lifecycle Integration Core (OSLC Core) Technical Committee

URL:
[1]
Description:
The goal of this group is to define essential technical elements of OSLC specifications and to offer guidance on common concerns for creating, updating, retrieving, and linking to lifecycle resources based on W3C Linked Data Platform (LDP).
Start date:
November 2013
Due date:
Current status of the group:
Open
Role in the group:
One member of OEG (Raúl García Castro) participates in the working group.
Enrolled:
November 2013
OASIS OSLC Lifecycle Integration for Change and Configuration Management (OSLC CCM) Technical Committee

URL:
[2]
Description:
The goal of this group is to produce specifications that leverage the OASIS OSLC lifecycle integration Core Specification and enable interoperation of essential change, configuration, and asset management processes across the entire application and product lifecycle to improve transparency, traceability, and agility.
Start date:
February 2014
Due date:
Current status of the group:
Open
Role in the group:
One member of OEG (Raúl García Castro) participates in the working group.
Enrolled:
February 2014
speaker: SYSTEM
